verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, nor mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%>; Neither do I <S%H1980>exercise<s%> myself in great <S%H1419>matters<s%>, Or in things too wonderful for <S%H6381>me<s%>.

Surely I have <S%H7737>stilled<s%> and <S%H1826>quieted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; Like a <S%H1580>weaned<s%> child with his <S%H517>mother<s%>, Like a weaned <S%H1580>child<s%> is my soul within <S%H5315>me<s%>.
O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> From this time forth and <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
